thread.title: Teen has no idea he's talking to the actual voice of Bart Simpson - then the 'penny drops'
thread.title_full: Teen has no idea he's talking to the actual voice of Bart Simpson - then the 'penny drops'

author: Nicola Oakley
title: Teen has no idea he's talking to the actual voice of Bart Simpson - then the 'penny drops'
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A kid selling boxes of biscuits to a woman he had seemingly met in the street got the surprise of his life when he realised was actually talking to the real Bart Simpson. 
The teen, known only as James, is talking to Nancy Cartwright - totally unaware of who she is or that she plays Bart in The Simpsons - and explaining why he's selling boxes of the treats with his brother. 
She asks him: "Let me guess, you're like, 14?" He responds that he is actually aged 13 and he's in eighth grade at middle school. 
Nancy replies, in her signature Bart voice: "I'm 10. I'm 10 and I go to Springfield Elementary. I'm Bart Simpson, put 'er there, man," offering her hand for a fist bump. (Photo: Spotted Cow Entertainment) 
James is clearly very confused by the whole thing and politely tells her it's a "really good impression" which, obviously, Nancy finds hilarious. 
"Is it pretty good? Do you know the guy that does it? Do you know who the voice is on that show?" she asks him. 
James replies: "No, not really," so Nancy offers her hand and tells him to shake it - again, in her Bart voice - but he still doesn't quite clock what's happening. Nancy Cartwright as Bart (Photo: Splash / Channel4) 
Naturally, if he didn't know who voiced the characters he would have had no clue Bart's voice was actually created by a woman - and so the thought wouldn't have crossed his mind it could be the real thing. 
After a few seconds, the penny drops and James has the sweetest reaction ever. (Photo: Spotted Cow Entertainment) 
Carry on watching for Nancy's kind gesture for the boy, who she describes as "so cute". 
He really does have the most adorable reaction. Like us on Facebook
